title: Resource Metadata
description: Metadata for all resource types (instructions, prompts, and skills). Skills may use additional fields like compatibility and license.

$schema.description: URI of the JSON Schema that describes the format of this JSON document

tags.description: Tags used for discovery and classification

description.description: Short explanation used in catalogs or UIs. For skills, should describe both what the skill does and when to use it.

compatibility.description: Indicates environment requirements (intended product, system packages, network access, etc.). Primarily used for skills.

license.description: License name or reference to a bundled license file. Primarily used for skills.
